# image

**Instance Property**

The custom image for the monogram.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var image: UIImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you supply an image, the system uses this image instead of a generic image or an image created from the name components.

## Configuring a Monogram

- **personNameComponents**: The names used to create a monogram image.
- **title**: The title for the monogram.
- **subtitle**: The subtitle for the monogram.
